website_summaries.verdict: This set of 4 baking rings offers practical sizes and stainless steel construction.
pros: This set contains 4 rings: 6, 8, 10 and 12 inches in diameter, all 3 inches deep
They work well for making tiered cakes, mousse, or fruit tarts
Can be used to cut out circles in larger sheet cakes, or you can bake directly in the rings

customer_reviews.title: I receive it to day. It has a rusty ...
customer_reviews.text: I receive it to day. It has a rusty dot on the small one so I I use a magnet to test it. Voila` ! It is not made from stainless steel . I think after wash it, have to dry it immediately to avoid rusty. Upset, bought it because they say it made form stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Great product, terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy, sturdy material. Won’t warp easily. Haven’t used it yet, but looks like it will bake great cakes. Deducted 1 star for packaging. Fell apart a little when opened, which is fine, won’t damage the product. USE BETTER PACKAGING TAPE. The tape left residue on all the rings that defies Goo Gone. The smaller ones I could remove mostly no problem. The large one were taped at three locations, all left pretty much all the adhesive onto the ring. It took soaking in Goo Gone, hot water, then a scourging pad for 15 minutes to remove 90% of it. This is a food prep product, tape is not food safe. Think of a better packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Hat

customer_reviews.title: Tape residue extremely difficult  to remove.
customer_reviews.text: Although the set of molds were exactly what I wanted, the largest mold was covered with tape that left large amounts of glue residue on the outer surface of the mold. The tape was used to attach cardboard pieces to inside the package the molds arrived in. I had an extremely difficult time getting the glue residue off the metal, even with using “Goo Gone”! After baking, brown discolored areas where the tape was used. It was totally unnecessary to tape the cardboard to the mold set.
customer_reviews.author: 1avidreader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mousse cakes
customer_reviews.text: I used these for making a mousse cake and they worked great, no complaints and I am looking forward to using them often.
customer_reviews.author: Jay S

customer_reviews.title: CAME DIRTY AND SCRATCHED
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed came with black stuff all over then and super scratched up, they look very old and used. Disgusting
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Works well, cleans easily
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do. No complaints. I'm not sure if this is really stainless steel or aluminum. I let it air dry and it hasn't rust. Very easy to clean, stackable for storage.
customer_reviews.author: TWin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe the bad reviews. No rust or warping.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy because of some questionable reviews here. I’m a professional chef and bought these for home. They aren’t as heavy duty as the ones I use at my bakery, but they also don’t need to be. I’ve been using them for 4 years now and have no rust on them and no warping at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging and nice quality rings. I will get a lot of use out of these.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: stainless steel should last quite awhile
customer_reviews.text: I used one ring for a mousse cheesecake and am happy with it. a very versatile product for me.
customer_reviews.author: teresa s miller

customer_reviews.title: great! good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy that they were last a long time!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used the 8" a few times already and love it! Bought it for entremets and works beautifully.

customer_reviews.title: Variety of sizes and non-stick pans.
customer_reviews.text: Best tart pans and non-stick pans great for baking any pie crust.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Stout

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t use them yet but they are what I expected

customer_reviews.title: Such an amazing quality. I purchased a cheaper square set prior ...
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing quality. I purchased a cheaper square set prior and wish I’d pay more but got this one instead. I baked in it placing it directly on baking sheet. Used it to cut out shape in a roll out cakes. It’s just perfect. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Yelena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality rings. Using for slicing cakes and for mousse making. Be carful sharp as shi#@.

customer_reviews.title: Tall, durable, smooth and round.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these rings for mousse cakes and absolutely satisfied with the product. Very durable, tall enough, smooth (the must for mousse cakes preparation) and round. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

product_meta.title: Set of 4 Round Mousse Cake Baking Rings Cutters Bottomless by EUROTINS
product_meta.description: Whether you are professional baker or hobby enthusiast, you will be pleasantly amazed with the baking experience. The cake tins have been hand crafted and may have seam yet elegant, sturdy and unique. The accurate dimension makes it easy and swift to make a perfect multilayer wedding cake. However, the tins can be used for individual size cakes for birthday or other celebrations, or just use a few of the tins for any other number of tiers!
feature_bullets: Ideal for making delicious fruit and sponge cakes, including impressive wedding and celebration cakes in tiers using matching tins
Made of stainless steel- long lasting, high quality at affordable price
Easy removal of cakes without damage after baking
Easy to use for professionals as well as home bakers, multitude of uses for the round rings

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars73 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
